videos.description: Jaylen Brown creates space with a hesitation move, then lays the ball of the glass.

videos.description: Jaylen Brown puts Jerami Grant on skates, then sinks the step-back jumper at the end of the first half.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Brown has Grant looking silly on step-back jumper) 2021/01/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Brown has Grant looking silly on step-back jumper
